content: The album "Born to Run" catapulted which American rockstar into international fame in 1975?

I think I know who you're talking about. It was Bruce Springsteen, right? He's the one who released "Born to Run" in 1975, and it really launched his career on a global scale. The album is considered a classic of the genre, and it helped establish him as one of the greatest rock stars of all time.
